description:
When metadata is empty, the function check_img_metadata_properties_quota doesn't return correctly as expected, because the incorrect code line:
"if metadata is None:
        return"
title: Optimization: check_img_metadata_properties_quota should return immediately if metadata is empty

comments.content:
When metadata is empty, the function check_img_metadata_properties_quota doesn't return correctly as expected, because the incorrect code line:
"if metadata is None:
        return"
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~jiataotj

comments.content: althoug current code lines doesn't cause serious problem, we should correct it to avoid useless program running to benefit overall performance, so we should use "if not metadata" to replace the current code line.
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~jiataotj

comments.content:
Fix proposed to branch: master
Review: https://review.openstack.org/44823
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~hudson-openstack
